Node.js<\/strong> is an open-source server environment that is free to use. Built on a JavaScript V8 engine, Node.js runs on various platforms like Windows, Linux, Unix, Mac OS X, etc., and uses JavaScript on the server. Node.js is not a language, or library, or framework but a runtime environment. Following are the 10 reasons to Choose Node.Js for Web Development<\/strong>.<\/p>\n\n\n\n

10 reasons to Choose Node.Js for Web Development<\/strong><\/h2>\n\n\n\n
  • Cache<\/a><\/li>
  • Cost-Effective<\/a><\/li>
  • Speed<\/a><\/li>
  • Real-Time Web App Development<\/a><\/li>
  • Strong and Large Community<\/a><\/li>
  • Easy Data Streaming<\/a><\/li>
  • SEO-Friendly<\/a><\/li>
  • Technical Support<\/a><\/li>
  • Deploys Web Apps Easily<\/a><\/li>
  • Allows Single Codebase<\/a><\/li><\/ul>\n\n\n\n

    Cache<\/h3>\n\n\n\n

    As Node.js is an open-source runtime atmosphere, it provides the capability to cache single modules. Re-execution of the codes is not required in Node.js whenever there is any request for the first module as caching enables applications to load the web pages quicker and respond more quickly to the user.<\/p>\n\n\n\n
